loan_protection: By making the loan collateral as other platforms already do
By introducing an evaluation mechanism for the account that makes the request (credit score evaluated by some IA prediction)
Introducing the possibility of repaying the loan in monthly installments
feedback: The interface is quite practical and efficient, allowing for smooth interaction. However, as is common in the early stages of any project, there might be occasional bugs or even an occasional infinite loop. Nevertheless, these issues don't seem to be causing any significant hindrance. I'll continue to engage with the platform, provide suggestions, and contribute to the growth of the ecosystem. Thank you for your efforts in making the ecosystem more user-friendly. I'll also try experimenting with larger numbers of supply and borrow to provide more comprehensive feedback. Keep up the good work, and I look forward to seeing further improvements!
